CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Enter Payment Information stage positioned above or below the Complete Purchase stage?
SRP.A: The Enter Payment Information stage is positioned {above} the Complete Purchase stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Add to Cart?
VE.A: The value of stage Add to Cart is {8163}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Leave Product Review?
VE.A: The value of stage Leave Product Review is {3160}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Enter Payment Information?
VE.A: The value of stage Enter Payment Information is {3967}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Visit Product Page, with a value of {13590}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Leave Product Review, with a value of {3160}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Add to Cart to stage Initiate Checkout?
SC.A: Decreased by {2470} Users from stage Add to Cart to stage Initiate Checkout.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart?
SC.A: Decreased by {1952} Users from stage Add to Wishlist to stage Add to Cart.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {99} Users from stage Enter Payment Information to stage Complete Purchase.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 9139? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Visit Product Page} stage has {13590}, the {Add to Wishlist} stage has {10115}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 4830? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Enter Payment Information} stage has {3967}, the {Complete Purchase} stage has {3868}, the {Leave Product Review} stage has {3160}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 4830 and 6928? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Initiate Checkout to Enter Payment Information, or from stage Enter Payment Information to Complete Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initiate Checkout} to {Enter Payment Information} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout, or from stage Complete Purchase to Leave Product Review?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Add to Cart} to {Initiate Checkout} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Visit Product Page to Add to Wishlist, from stage Add to Cart to Initiate Checkout, or from stage Add to Wishlist to Add to Cart?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Visit Product Page} to stage {Add to Wishlist} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Visit Product Page} and {Add to Wishlist} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Enter Payment Information} and {Complete Purchase} stages.
